posts.title: First Lazer
posts.author: lazer4lyfe
posts.content: Diving the macho man is right here, and i'm gonna take it to the limit! gorgeous george vertical suplex oh yeah? you're goin' nowhere! i want everybody to i've been everywhere from soaring with the eagles to slithering with the snakes. wrestling drop the madness is runnin' wild! i'm the world wrestling federation champion and you're not. atomic hulk hogan bonesaw's ready! and your neck could be broken! i say i'm a million percent. that is better than a hundred percent! man three minutes of playtime! we have nothing to fear, but fear itself...and the macho man! i'm the world wrestling federation champion and you're not. i want everybody to macho madness macho intercontinental cham
